channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Medtronic MyCareLink 24950, 24952 Patient Monitor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Medtronic MyCareLink 24950, 24952 Patient Monitor

item.title: CVE-2018-10626|2024-08-05T07:46:45.928Z -- ics-cert -- medtronic%20mycarelink%2024950%2C%2024952%20patient%20monitor
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in all versions of Medtronic MyCareLink 24950 and 24952 Patient Monitor. The affected product's update service does not sufficiently verify the authenticity of the data uploaded. An attacker who obtains per-product credentials from the monitor and paired implantable cardiac device information can potentially upload invalid data to the Medtronic CareLink network.

item.title: CVE-2018-10622|2024-08-05T07:46:47.036Z -- ics-cert -- medtronic%20mycarelink%2024950%2C%2024952%20patient%20monitor
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in all versions of Medtronic MyCareLink 24950 and 24952 Patient Monitor. The affected products use per-product credentials that are stored in a recoverable format. An attacker can use these credentials for network authentication and encryption of local data at rest.
